title: USF receiver arrested on possession charge
text:
USF receiver arrested on possession charge Deangelo Antoine, 19, a freshman, was arrested early Sunday morning. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs USF receiver arrested on possession charge 10 News Staff, WTSP 2:57 p.m. EDT October 25, 2015 Deangelo Antoine, 19, a freshman, was arrested early Sunday morning. (Photo: HCSO) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Tampa, Florida -- A University of South Florida wide receiver has been arrested on a charge of possession of a controlled substance, according to TBO.com . 
Deangelo Antoine, 19, a freshman, was arrested early Sunday morning. 
The former standout for Orlando Oak Ridge was arrested on campus near USF Palm Drive and USF Laurel drive shortly after 1 a.m., according to the Hillsborough County Sheriff’s office. He was released on $2,000 bond around 11:25 a.m., records show. 
“USF Athletics is aware of the arrest,” according to a statement released by the university. “Antoine has been immediately suspended from all team activities as we continue to gather more information and work with the proper authorities.” YOU MAY ALSO LIKE...
